Class Importer

    Importer

    Class for handling the importing of files.

    Author:
    Simon O'Neill

                       javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter fileFilter)
        Imports the file. The file filter will dictate how the file is exported.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - The name of the file.
        fileFilter - - The filter of the file which will determine the method of importing.
